title: Support for ssh-add
body:
Without ssh-add support it is very hard to use git hub. It would be nice to have a the ability to use ssh key files for authentication, but currently the ssh-add says: Could not open a connection to your authentication agent.
I'm sure there are a lot of people would like to use ssh keys for authentication.

comments.body: further, the ssh-agent should be shared between Windows (win32) and Linux programs so that we only need to add the key to a single ssh-agent (typing our password to unlock it just once).
